title: Will A Rioter play for my 3 Belated Birthdays or is that not a thing anymore?
body: Just wondering, if I could cash that in? I'm only maybe 100 wins away from the 1000

replies.body: wait so theres this thing where if u win 1000 times and its ur birthday a rioteer played with you??????????????
I'm pretty sure if it's your birthday, you can ask or something. I'm not a 100% sure, I don't see it very often, I've seen it a few times though.
